name: @midnight-bank/bank-contract
description: Midnight Bank - Privacy-Preserving Banking Smart Contract
author: Midnight Developer

scripts._compile-compact: echo 'Compiling contract...' && compact compile src/bank.compact ./src/managed/bank && touch .compact-cache && echo 'Contract compiled and cached' && npm run compact
scripts.build: npm run compact && rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -Rf ./src/managed ./dist/managed && npm run update-ui-resources
scripts.update-ui-resources: npm run update-ui-resources:compiler && npm run update-ui-resources:keys
scripts.update-ui-resources:keys: mkdir -p ../bank-ui/public/keys ../bank-ui/public/zkir && cp src/managed/bank/keys/* ../bank-ui/public/keys/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/managed/bank/zkir/* ../bank-ui/public/zkir/ 2>/dev/null || true
